title: Shares of Roku Look Extended Here, Book Some Profits and Raise Stops
text:
Roku, Inc. ( ROKU ) has had an incredible rally this calendar year. Just $30 a share in early January and trading above $150 now. Wow.

In this daily bar chart of ROKU, below, we can see this journey higher. Prices are more than $30 above the rising 50-day moving average line and about $80 above the rising 200-day line. Sounds extended to me.

The daily On-Balance-Volume (OBV) line shows a strong rise from January telling us that buyers of ROKU have been more aggressive.

The Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD) oscillator is above the zero line in a bullish configuration but the two averages that make up the indicator have been narrowing.

In this weekly Japanese candlestick chart of ROKU, below, we see no reversal patterns.

In this first Point and Figure chart of ROKU, below, we can see the straight up rally and that prices have exceeded a price target.

In this second Point and Figure chart of ROKU, we used weekly data and here too prices have exceeded a price target.

Bottom line strategy: ROKU has rallied a long way in a short period of time. Prices are extended but the uptrend is still intact. It wouldn't hurt to take some profits and raise your sell stop to $130 on the balance.
description: Let's review the charts and indicators to see if there is more to come....ROKU
authors: Shares Of Roku Look Extended Here
Indicators To See If There Is More To Come.
